About

Our Team

Justin Smithline

CRO

Justin Smithline is just a small town boy trying to escape his past as a chocalatier's apprentice in Belgium. Justin has traveled across 97 different countries (4 of them named by him), and is most famous for discovering Canada.

In his spare time, Justin is forced to try different types of coffee from Phil and enjoys fighting lions in an underground gladiator ring, often simultaneously.

Mark LaRosa

CRO

Mark LaRosa has been a sales executive and entrepreneur his entire career. Mark is a sought out expert in start-up sales, has brought many companies from zero sales to profitability. He is the author of Sales, Swingers & Start-ups: Practical Stories to ensure startup success, and continues his writing on both the FunnelFire and QuotaCrush blogs.

When not working on FunnelFire, Mark is the Chairman of the Board of the Hugh Oâ€™Brian Youth Leadership Foundation, an international non-profit focused on promoting youth leadership. Mark holds a BS in MIS from Stevens Institute of Technology.

David Pfeffer

CTO

David Pfefer is a software enthusiast, professor, and technology wizard. Having successfully created the android (and programmed it to dream about electric sheep), David Pfeffer has been spending time focused on retiring rogue robots.

As a hobby, David Pfeffer enjoys making carnitas and overlooking the factory where he shelled peanuts as his first job, which he has since expanded into a butcher's-shop-and-almond-factory.

Phil Barresi

Barista

Phil Barresi coded this page, and everything else you see. His favorite passtime activity's include getting delayed on Amtrak and pretending to be a frontend engineer.

In his spare time, Phil codes for FunnelFire, which is his day job too. In the rest of his time, Phil gets as close as possible to becoming a sentient glass of cold brew coffee.
